original_text: “At that time Michael, the great prince who protects your people, will arise. There will be a time of distress such as has not happened from the beginning of nations until then. But at that time your people—everyone whose name is found written in the book—will be delivered.
korean_text: 그 때에 네 민족을 호위하는 큰 군주 미가엘이 일어날 것이요 또 환난이 있으리니 이는 개국 이래로 그 때까지 없던 환난일 것이며 그 때에 네 백성 중 책에 기록된 모든 자가 구원을 받을 것이라

sentences.original_text: the great prince who protects your people
There will be a time of distress
such as has not happened from the beginning of nations until then
sentences.korean_translation: 나라들이 시작된 이래 그때까지 일어나지 않았던 것 같은

sentences.original_text: But at that time your people
everyone whose name is found written in the book
sentences.korean_translation: 책에 기록된 이름을 찾은 모든 사람은
